summary: Something happens when Sarah, Marley and Emma visit their aunt Cora. A strange creature is killing people one by one. The only way to survive from the creature: to hide until dawn.
cast: Stephanie Hunt|Sarah Dugdale|Alisha Newton|Hilary Jardine|Richard Harmon|Jonathan Whitesell|Deborah Kara Unger|Dylan Playfair|Michael Adamthwaite|Garry Chalk|Laine MacNeil|John Hainsworth|Veronika Hadrava|Natasha Zacher
title: The Hollow
